<<<<<<< HEAD
Nevvs from the north: or, A true relation of the affaires in those parts, and in Scotland. Being a letter sent to a friend from Penrith in Cumberland, the 23. of June, 1648. And published for the satisfaction of those that desire to be truly informed of the present condition of those places. H. H.
[2], 6 p.
Printed by Richard Cotes, London : 1648.
Signed on p.6: H. H. The word "published" is preceded by a square bracket. Annotation on Thomason copy: "June 29". Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
=======
Nevvs from the north: or, A true relation of the affaires in those parts, and in Scotland. Being a letter sent to a friend from Penrith in Cumberland, the 23. of June, 1648. And published for the satisfaction of those that desire to be truly informed of the present condition of those places. H. H.
[2], 6 p.
Printed by Richard Cotes, London : 1648.
Signed on p.6: H. H. The word "published" is preceded by a square bracket. Annotation on Thomason copy: "June 29". Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
Richard Cotes
